Anomaly of LISFLOOD modelled top Soil Moisture Index (SMI) at 5 km resolution.

In the EDO MapViewer, visualized cells have a spatial resolution of about 10 km for scales smaller than 1:750000, while cells of 5 km are displayed when zoomed into detail, at scales larger than 1:750000.

WARNING! From the 11th of March 2019, soil moisture and low-flow index data have been upgraded to a new version with a larger spatial extent, based on the latest LISFLOOD model.
Please note that these new data are still under evaluation and are not fully validated.

[Less than or equal to -2, -2 to -1.5, -1.5 to -1] : Drier than normal; [-1 to 1] : Near Normal conditions; [1 to 1.5, 1.5 to 2, greater than or equal to 2] : Wetter than normal
Valid version(s) for the time series: Version 2.1.0 covers data from 1995-01-01 to the current date. Version 2.1.0 notes: Based on Soil Moisture Index, EFAS 4.0. Baseline until 2019.
